factual: What are the penalties for committing an offense against competition regulations that involves earning illegal profits between VND 500 million and under VND 3 billion?
scenario_based: Imagine a company enters into an agreement with competitors to fix prices, resulting in each having more than 30% market share. What legal consequences might they face if the damage caused is less than VND 5 billion but over VND 1 billion?
advice_seeking: If I suspect my business has been harmed by anti-competitive agreements among other companies, what steps can I take to seek justice or report such violations?
